channel.title: Shirt[Req]-Short ideas?
channel.description: Well im at it again using my new knowlage of prims im redoing scating gear and so far i finished shorts (the legs are used from the arma platelegs) but i need ideas because it looks to plain..i was thinking a wallet chain or studs but idk (i want the shirt to be rocker abstract or scater related)
